    (iv) ABUJA accepts two (2) ‘A’ level credit passes 
in Economics, Commerce, NCE or ND at 
upper credit level or ten (10) points in IJMB 
in relevant subjects in addition to the 'O’ 
level requirements.  
(v) ADSU - As in Public Administration.  
(vi) AUN same as in Finance  
(vii) EBSU  accepts  HND,  NCE/ND  pass 
 at merit/credit level in relevant 
programmes in addition to 'O' level 
requirements. ND must be at upper credit 
level.  
(viii) ESUTECH accepts ND in relevant programmes 
within the Faculty into 200 level in addition 
to the UTME requirements.  
(ix) FED-DUTSINMA requires two (2) ‘A’ level 
passes in Economics and Mathematics or any 
Social Science subject. It also requires 
ND/NCE with good grades in Business 
Management from a recognized institution.  
(x) JOS accepts ND lower credit, DELSU and 
BAYERO  (upper  credit)  in 
 relevant programmes.  
(xi) LAGOS requires Very good passes in three (3) 
JUPEB/’A’ Level subjects: Economics and any 
two (2) of Financial Accounting, Business 
Management, Government, Geography and 
Mathematics.  
(xii) MCPHERSON accepts   
a) JUPEB/IJMB/ATS (Final) of ICAN or 
approved equivalent in related 
programmes.  
b) AIB or other professional qualifications in 
relevant programmes.
